name: European Society for Rural Sociology
goal:
The objectives of the Society are the furtherance of:
a. the generation and dissemination of knowledge on rural sociological issues
b. international co-operation and the exchange of information and experience in the field of rural sociological research
c. the training of rural sociologists
d. the application of rural sociological research to the well-being of society;
all in the widest sense
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Environment, Food Safety, International co-operation and development, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives:
Research end equivalent Projects are conducted individually by members of the European society for rural sociology.
For further information, please refer to the Transparency Register Guidelines, part 3.7.
